name: Missed Call
description:
An extremely short experience tackling feelings of loneliness and isolation. You play as an individual who has experienced some unknown trauma which has resulted in them becoming stuck in a loop. 

This project was created in just 2 days as a submission for Brackey's 5th game jam with the theme "Stronger Together". I plan on revisiting it at a later date to add more content so feel free to check back here for any news on updates.
